overview: shamshon marries the daughter of teacher Mahmoud Al-Sabak, and is surprised after the marriage that Hama has made him sign a number of checks for the costs of marriage, the wife frequently travel abroad by virtue of her work as a translator, so shamshon decides to travel to Upper Egypt to marry another woman who meets his requests and obey him, so he chooses on the sleepy girl The naive rural woman marries her as she will obey him in every way, but soon observes the world around her and revolts and demands his equality with his first wife.
title: Nehayet Ragol Tazawag
